result:
.poster(data-aos="fade") //- .poster .poster__head-mobile img(src="@/assets/img/cup.svg") span Top Recorders 2019 .wrapper .poster__info(data-aos="fade-up") //- .poster__info .poster__head(v-if="app.acf && app.acf.info.awards") .poster__icon img(src="@/assets/img/cup.svg") span.poster__nomination Top Recorders
2019 router-link(to="/").poster__hash(v-html="getCategoryById(app.apps_category ? app.apps_category[0] : '').name") h1.poster__title(v-html="app.title ? app.title.rendered : ''") .poster__subtitle(v-html="app.acf ? app.acf.info.excerpt : ''") //- router-link(to="/").poster__link a(href="#").poster__link span Download .poster__bottom(v-if="app.acf && app.acf.info.price") span.poster__price Price: .poster__price-tag(v-html="app.acf.info.price") carousel(v-if="app.acf && app.acf.info.photos" :slides="app.acf.info.photos")
